Package titan.impl

Class ODESolverNewtonRaphson

java.lang.Object
titan.impl.ODESolverNewtonRaphson
All Implemented Interfaces:
ODESolverInterface
public class ODESolverNewtonRaphson
extends java.lang.Object
implements ODESolverInterface
A class that use Newton Raphson ODE solver properties to calculate the next position For solving a general differential equation dy/dt = f(t,y) y(t) describes the state of the system at time t f(t,y(t)) defines the derivative of y(t) with respect to time t
Author:
Group 12

    Solve the differential equation by taking multiple steps of equal size, starting at time 0.
    StateInterface step​(ODEFunctionInterface f, double t, StateInterface y, double h)
    Update rule for one step: we apply the Multivariate Newton-Raphson Method: https://skill-lync.com/projects/week-6-multivariate-newton-rhapson-solver-18

  • Method Details

    • solve

      public StateInterface[] solve​(ODEFunctionInterface f, StateInterface y0, double[] ts)
      Solve the differential equation by taking multiple steps.
      Specified by:
      solve in interface ODESolverInterface
      Parameters:
      f - the function defining the differential equation dy/dt=f(t,y)
      y0 - the starting state
      ts - the times at which the states should be output, with ts[0] being the initial time
      Returns:
      an array of size ts.length with all intermediate states along the path

    • solve

      public StateInterface[] solve​(ODEFunctionInterface f, StateInterface y0, double tf, double h)
      Solve the differential equation by taking multiple steps of equal size, starting at time 0. The final step may have a smaller size, if the step-size does not exactly divide the solution time range
      Specified by:
      solve in interface ODESolverInterface
      Parameters:
      f - the function defining the differential equation dy/dt=f(t,y)
      y0 - the starting state
      tf - the final time
      h - the size of step to be taken
      Returns:
      an array of size round(tf/h)+1 including all intermediate states along the path

    • inverseMatrix

      public static double[][] inverseMatrix​(double[][] jacobianMatrix)
      https://commons.apache.org/proper/commons-math/javadocs/api-3.5/org/apache/commons/math3/linear/RealMatrix.html
      Parameters:
      jacobianMatrix - : matrix to be inverted
      Returns:
      inverted matrix: inverse of the jacobianMatrix

    • multipliesMatrices

      public static double[] multipliesMatrices​(double[][] jacobianMatrix, double[] functionsMatrix)
      Multiplies a matrix with a vector
      Parameters:
      jacobianMatrix - : 2D matrix
      functionsMatrix - : 1D matrix (vector)
      Returns:
      result of the multiplication of: jacobianMatrix*functionsMatrix

    • step

      public StateInterface step​(ODEFunctionInterface f, double t, StateInterface y, double h)
      Update rule for one step: we apply the Multivariate Newton-Raphson Method: https://skill-lync.com/projects/week-6-multivariate-newton-rhapson-solver-18
      Specified by:
      step in interface ODESolverInterface
      Parameters:
      f - the function defining the differential equation dy/dt=f(t,y)
      t - the time
      y - the state
      h - the step size
      Returns:
      the new state after taking one step
